text: Yeh qaumein jinke qissey hum tumhein suna rahey hain (tumhare saamne misaal mein maujood hain). Unke Rasool unke paas khuli khuli nihsnaiyan lekar aaye, magar jis cheez ko woh ek dafa jhutla chuke thay phir usey woh maanne waley na thay. Dekho is tarah hum munkireen e haqq ke dilon par mohar laga dete hain
